text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Homeless" means:
lacking a fixed, regular, and adequate nighttime residence; or
having a primary nighttime residence that is:
a supervised publicly or privately operated shelter designed to provide temporary living accommodations; or
a public or private place not designed for or ordinarily used as a regular sleeping accommodation for human beings.
"Sexual orientation" means the identification of an individual as to male or female homosexuality, heterosexuality, bisexuality, or gender-related identity.
